common.tagline: Technology Provider for WhatsApp Business Platform

home.heroTitle: One verified control plane for Growth, Build, and Community.
home.heroDescription: Activate the official Meta Cloud API, keep every workspace isolated, and run campaigns, creation, and community in one place with billing and audit already wired.
home.suitesTitle: Three rooms to run your business
home.suiteGrowthDesc: Run campaigns, offers, and payments through Meta Hub, Pay, Trade, and Marketplace.
home.suiteBuildDesc: Create, design, and automate with Studio, Helper, Apps, all on the Platform control plane.
home.suiteCommunityDesc: Host communities and engagement drops with Community and Arena in one place.
home.ecosystemSubtitle: Ten modules. One operating system. All workspace-scoped.
home.complianceOfficialApiDesc: All messaging runs through the verified Technology Provider flow with delivery checks.
home.complianceTemplatesDesc: Template creation, review, approvals, and delivery tracking live in one workspace.
home.complianceClarityDesc: Membership, roles, and audit ensure teams know who sent what and why.
home.integrationsSubtitle: Battle-tested infrastructure from verify to deploy.
home.timelineSubtitle: From Meta Hub to full ecosystem — transparent progress.
home.ctaSectionDesc: Start with a free workspace and connect the official Meta Cloud API in minutes.
home.trustSubtitle: Built with enterprise-grade security and compliance.

pricing.title: Subscription plans for the entire ecosystem
pricing.subtitle: One subscription covers your workspace with access to all available modules.
pricing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Gigaviz pricing.

about.title: About Gigaviz
about.subtitle: We're building the operating system for WhatsApp-first businesses.
about.missionDesc: To give every business a verified, auditable, and scalable WhatsApp workspace.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

auth.verifyEmailDesc: We sent a verification link to {email}. Please check your inbox.
auth.disclaimer: Gigaviz is a Verified Technology Provider for solutions built on the WhatsApp Business Platform (Cloud API). WhatsApp and Meta are trademarks of Meta Platforms, Inc.
